subject: Technology
description: The US government warns of the risk of hackers trying to exploit an internet bug and suggests that users change passwords after sites are patched.
title: US warns of Heartbleed bug danger

subject: Technology
description: Former US Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice's appointment to the board of technology firm Dropbox draws criticism from some customers.
title: Protests as Condi Rice joins Dropbox

subject: Technology
description: Google will release Google Glass to the general public on 15 April for a single day. Still a prototype, the device will sell for $1,500 (£894).
title: Google Glass on sale for one day

subject: Technology
description: Confusion and a lack of planning were the reasons the BBC's £98.4m Digital Media Initiative failed, according to a report.
title: BBC 'complacent' over IT failure

subject: Technology
description: A key member of a cybercrime gang could face years in jail after pleading guilty to stealing millions using stolen and fake credit cards.
title: US card thief faces lengthy jail term

subject: Technology
description: A new burrowing robot for anchoring miniature submarines has been developed, inspired by the Atlantic razor clam.
title: 'RoboClam' could anchor submarines

subject: Technology
description: Spending lots of time on Facebook looking at pictures of friends could make women insecure about their bodies, research suggests.
title: 'Selfie' body image warning issued

subject: Technology
description: Some Somalis are experiencing a form of "culture shock" since fibre optic services launched in Mogadishu over the last week, an internet provider says.
title: Somalia's internet 'culture shock'

subject: Technology
description: A British scientist who made it possible for hard disks to become radically bigger and cheaper wins a one million euro technology award.
title: Hard disk pioneer wins tech prize

subject: Technology
description: Netflix 4K streaming is now available to regular subscribers but the new feature of the on-demand video service will not work on pre-2014 televisions.
title: Netflix 4K streaming goes live

subject: Technology
description: Just three police forces out of 43 in England and Wales have a comprehensive plan in place to deal with a large-scale cyber-attack, a report finds.
title: Forces 'unprepared' for cybercrime

subject: Technology
description: Google's investment arm has taken a financial stake in a robot-maker that is seeking to disrupt the service industry.
title: Google invests in more robots

subject: Technology
description: A Samsung S4 smartphone is charged in 26 seconds during a demonstration of a new bio-organic battery at a technology conference.
title: Battery offers 30-second charging

subject: Technology
description: A 3D printer available for under $300 has experts asking whether the technology is about to go mass market.
title: Cheap 3D printer is Kickstarter hit

subject: Technology
description: A page saying "soldiers deserve to be raped and murdered" is removed by Facebook despite the site declaring such content is not against its rules.
title: Facebook wipes soldiers rape page

subject: Technology
description: Japanese carmaker Toyota is recalling 6.4 million vehicles globally due to five separate issues, including problems with steering columns.
title: Toyota to recall 6.4 million vehicles

subject: Technology
description: The General Lighthouse Authorities of the UK and Ireland issue a map illustrating the effects of the outage that hit Russia's GLONASS sat-nav system.
title: Map illustrates 'Russian GPS' fault

subject: Technology
description: Twitter has a new look that will be rolled out to everyone over the coming weeks, and the BBC took to the social media network to gauge reaction.
